name: react-intl-miniparse
description: Do a craptacular job of parsing the react-intl templates, so that you can do text  transforms without transforming the template controls

scripts.clean: rimraf -f docs && rimraf -f build && rimraf -f dist && mkdir docs && mkdir dist && mkdir build
scripts.dist: cp build/rim.bundle.min.js dist/ && cp build/es6/src/ts/rim.d.ts dist/
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run peg && npm run typescript && npm run rollup && npm run terser && npm run dist
